idCitation.resTitle: NASA's Planetary Data System Geosciences Node Orbital Data Explorer (ODE) Product Coverage Shapefile for mars_mro_ctx_edr_m_c0a

dataIdInfo.idPurp: NASA's Planetary Data System Geosciences Node Orbital Data Explorer (ODE) Product Coverage Shapefile for mars_mro_ctx_edr_m_c0a
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This is the product coverage for all products of type EDR from the CTX instrument on instrument host MRO viewing Mars. All latitudes are planetocentric. This coverage is valid for center longitude 0 cylindrical projections with positive east, -180 to 180, longitudes. The shapefile was generated from PDS Geosciences Orbital Data Explorer (ODE) on 2017-11-29T11:17:53.169. Links: NASA Planetary Data System: http://pds.jpl.nasa.gov/ Geosciences Node: http://geo.pds.nasa.gov/ Orbital Data Explorer: http://ode.rsl.wustl.edu/ A direct link to ODE's product and files pages can be found in the ODE_external_urlField and ODE_Files_URLField columns of the attribute table Fields: CenterLat Field - Footprint Center Planetocentric Latitude CenterLon Field - Footprint Center East Longitude MaxLat Field - Maximum Planetocentric Latitude MinLat Field - Minimum Planetocentric Latitude EastLon Field - Easternmost East Longitude WestLon Field - Westernmost East Longitude EmAngle Field - Emission Angle (-1 if there is no valid emission angle value) InAngle Field - Incidence Angle (-1 if there is no valid incidence angle value) PhAngle Field - Phase Angle (-1 if there is no valid phase angle value) SolLong Field - Solar Longitude (-1 if there is no valid solar longitude value) NPoleState Field - Flag to indicate that the footprint covers the target north pole (T or F) SPoleState Field - Flag to indicate that the footprint covers the target south pole (T or F) Target Field - Observation target - example Mars or Mercury ProductId Field - PDS Product Id DataSetId Field - PDS Data Set Id InstHostId Field - Instrument Id Host InstId Field - Instrument Id UTCstart Field - Observation Start time in Utc UTCend Field - Observation End time in Utc PDSVolId Field - PDS Volume Id ProdType Field - ODE Product Type (example: RDR - Reduced Data Record) CreateDate Field - Product Creation Time in Utc ShpSource Field - Source of the product footprint (example: PDS Label, inIndex File, Data File, etc.) ExtURL Field - URL to an external URL that holds information about this product (optional) Ext2URL Field - URL to a second external URL that holds information about this product (optional). For HiRISE, this is the JPIP address Ext3URL Field - URL to a third external URL that holds information about this product (optional) ProdURL Field - URL to ODE's product page FilesURL Field - URL to ODE's product file list LabelURL Field - URL to the product's label PILOTURL Field - URL to USGS's Pilot UPC database (optional) ODEId Field - An ODE internal ID SubSiteTag Field - A special ODE field that indicates whether this footprint overlaps specific targets (Example: Spirit Rover)
dataIdInfo.idCredit: NASA Planetary Data System Geosciences Node

Consts.useLimit: There are no access or use limitated for this data. Please see http://geo.pds.nasa.gov/citations.html for scientific literature citation policies
